name: Flights With Friends
overview:
Flights with Friends makes finding and booking flights with your friends easier. Most groups research flights while they are not in the same room (usually while at work) which makes the process of sharing flight info difficult. Flights with Friends takes care of the whole process so you and your friends can focus on getting the best deal.

How it works: Start by selecting the friends you’ll be traveling with, then select where you are going and when. The best flights are shown according to your criteria while you and your friends chat about your options. Once the group decides booking is just a click away. Selecting seats together is easy because you can see where everyone wants to sit, and you can book together.
